duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare histologic slides from tissue sections for microscopic examination and diagnosis.
Proper accessioning and labeling of all tissue samples.
Operate laboratory equipment to properly fix, dehydrate, and embed tissue specimens in paraffin wax.
Perform tissue sectioning of paraffin-embedded tissue using a microtome.
Appropriately stain slides and perform cover slipping of stained slides either manually or automated.
Prepare solutions and reagents for routine and special stain procedures.
Perform special stains and immunohistochemistry procedures, under general supervision.

education_certification.credential: Valid License by NYSED Office of the Professions
